    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="en">Earthquakes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erdbeben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tremblements de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terremoti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σεισμοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explican las ondas producidas por un terremoto a través de animaciones. Comenta qué es la magnitud y la intensidad de un terremoto.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the tremors which are produced by an earthquake using animations. It remarks on what the magnitude and intensity of an earthquake are.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Terremotos</string>
            <string language="en">Earthquakes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das den Tremor erklärt, die durch ein 
Erdbeben mit Animationen produziert werden. Er erwähnt auf, was
die Größe und die Intensität eines Erdbebens sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant les tremblements qui sont 
produits par un tremblement de terre en utilisant des animations. 
Il remarque sur ce que sont l'importance et l'intensité d'un 
tremblement de terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica os tremors que são 
produzidos por um terremoto usando animations. Observa em o que 
o valor e a intensidade de um terremoto são.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega i tremiti che sono prodotti 
da un terremoto usando le animazioni. Rileva su che cosa la 
grandezza e l'intensità di un terremoto sono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τις δονήσεις που παράγονται από έναν
σεισμό χρησιμοποιώντας τις ζωτικότητες. Παρατηρεί σε αυτά 
που το μέγεθος και η ένταση ενός σεισμού είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erdbeben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tremblements de terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terremotos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
